channel.title: CloudStack on SAMZONG
channel.description: Recent content in CloudStack on SAMZONG

item.title: HowTo Install CloudStack 4.8 on CentOS 6.x
item.description: #!/bin/bash # Install CloudStack.sh # setting static ip in : /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 # Check Service # Install # hostname --fqdn # service network restart # trun off selinux in : /etc/selinux/config #SELinux=disabed # trun off iptables.
